page.title: 19TRAFFIC ON WILTSHIRE ROADS
page.content: A Traffic survey was carried out at the junction of the A344/A360 and the B3096. These roads carry various types of traffic: 1.{Private cars:}Travelling between Amesbury/Salisbury and Shrewton. Majority had one person in them indicating that they were coming home from work or shopping. 2.{Vans:}For delivery or maintenance. 3.{Lorries:}Heavy gravel or grain. 4.{Buses and Coaches:}A two hourly bus service and very few coaches. 5.{Motor or Pedalcycles:}One or two. 6.{Tractors and/or Trailers:}Many were seen in the fields harvesting crops 7.{Army Vehicles:}Army convoys use this junction, ranging from tanks and tank transporters to Landrovers towing guns, especially during big international exercises on Salisbury Plain.
